page.title: 20Survey of Eating Habits.
page.content: Three main meals a day and a snack before bed time is usual. We often sit in the kitchen or dining room using knives and forks, but sometimes eat off a tray in front of the T.V. For breakfast toast is most commonly eaten,cereals coming second.Cooked breakfast of bacon,eggs etc.,is eaten by about one third of our sample. Potatoes, meat and vegetables such as peas and carrots,are the most commonly eaten dinner,with fish and chips not quite as common.Some people prefer to have a cooked meal at tea-time and a snack at mid-day.Supper is mostly just tea and biscuits. From our survey we found that the average spent on each persons food was Â£10.91 per week.
